info.name: MCP Server: https://mcp-proxy.yashmahe2021.workers.dev/mcp
info.description:
Auto-generated Postman collection for MCP server: https://mcp-proxy.yashmahe2021.workers.dev/mcp

Generated on: 2025-06-24T18:09:23.025Z

This collection contains all discovered tools, resources, and prompts from the MCP server.

All requests go through the MCP Bridge API for proper integration.

request.description:
Add two numbers

Tool: add

This request calls the MCP Bridge API which will execute the tool on the connected MCP server.

Parameters:
- a (number) (required): First number
- b (number) (required): Second number

Subtract two numbers

Tool: subtract

This request calls the MCP Bridge API which will execute the tool on the connected MCP server.

Parameters:
- a (number) (required): First number
- b (number) (required): Second number

Multiply two numbers

Tool: multiply

This request calls the MCP Bridge API which will execute the tool on the connected MCP server.

Parameters:
- a (number) (required): First number
- b (number) (required): Second number

Divide two numbers

Tool: divide

This request calls the MCP Bridge API which will execute the tool on the connected MCP server.

Parameters:
- a (number) (required): Dividend
- b (number) (required): Divisor

Raise base to exponent power

Tool: power

This request calls the MCP Bridge API which will execute the tool on the connected MCP server.

Parameters:
- base (number) (required): Base number
- exponent (number) (required): Exponent

Calculate square root (supports negative numbers with complex result)

Tool: square_root

This request calls the MCP Bridge API which will execute the tool on the connected MCP server.

Parameters:
- value (number) (required): Number to find square root of

Calculate factorial of a non-negative integer

Tool: factorial

This request calls the MCP Bridge API which will execute the tool on the connected MCP server.

Parameters:
- value (integer) (required): Non-negative integer

Calculate sine of an angle

Tool: sin

This request calls the MCP Bridge API which will execute the tool on the connected MCP server.

Parameters:
- angle (number) (required): Angle value
- unit (string) (optional): Unit of angle measurement

Calculate cosine of an angle

Tool: cos

This request calls the MCP Bridge API which will execute the tool on the connected MCP server.

Parameters:
- angle (number) (required): Angle value
- unit (string) (optional): Unit of angle measurement

Calculate tangent of an angle

Tool: tan

This request calls the MCP Bridge API which will execute the tool on the connected MCP server.

Parameters:
- angle (number) (required): Angle value
- unit (string) (optional): Unit of angle measurement

Calculate logarithm with specified base

Tool: log

This request calls the MCP Bridge API which will execute the tool on the connected MCP server.

Parameters:
- value (number) (required): Value to take logarithm of
- base (number) (optional): Base of logarithm

Calculate natural logarithm

Tool: ln

This request calls the MCP Bridge API which will execute the tool on the connected MCP server.

Parameters:
- value (number) (required): Value to take natural logarithm of

Calculate exponential function (e^x)

Tool: exp

This request calls the MCP Bridge API which will execute the tool on the connected MCP server.

Parameters:
- value (number) (required): Exponent value

Solve quadratic equation ax² + bx + c = 0

Tool: quadratic

This request calls the MCP Bridge API which will execute the tool on the connected MCP server.

Parameters:
- a (number) (required): Coefficient of x²
- b (number) (required): Coefficient of x
- c (number) (required): Constant term

Calculate distance between two points

Tool: distance

This request calls the MCP Bridge API which will execute the tool on the connected MCP server.

Parameters:
- x1 (number) (required): X coordinate of first point
- y1 (number) (required): Y coordinate of first point
- x2 (number) (required): X coordinate of second point
- y2 (number) (required): Y coordinate of second point

Calculate arithmetic mean of a list of numbers

Tool: mean

This request calls the MCP Bridge API which will execute the tool on the connected MCP server.

Parameters:
- values (any) (required): Array of numbers or JSON array string

Calculate median of a list of numbers

Tool: median

This request calls the MCP Bridge API which will execute the tool on the connected MCP server.

Parameters:
- values (any) (required): Array of numbers or JSON array string

Add two complex numbers

Tool: complex_add

This request calls the MCP Bridge API which will execute the tool on the connected MCP server.

Parameters:
- a_real (number) (required): Real part of first complex number
- a_imag (number) (required): Imaginary part of first complex number
- b_real (number) (required): Real part of second complex number
- b_imag (number) (required): Imaginary part of second complex number
